snippet.title: RPG Alphadia - Official Trailer
snippet.description:
An epic RPG title in the mobile game scene has come to the Android!
RPG Alphadia is available for Android/iOS.

Get it now on:

App Store
https://itunes.apple.com/app/id473645314?mt=8

Google Play
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=kemco.execreate.alphadia&hl=en

After a century since the end of the Energi War, Schwarzschild Empire has once again begun plotting world domination. It is during this time that Ash and Karim rescue a young woman being pursued by a contingent of foreign soldiers. Who is this mysterious girl and what fate is in store for Ash and those with him...?

©2007-2011 KEMCO/EXE-CREATE
※All graphics terms, characters and elements are subject to change in the actual product.
